column5: Private bedroom with 3 twin -size beds.  A single twin-size bed and a bunk bed that consists of 2 twin-size beds.  We also have an inflatable queen size bed if needed.   great for traveling friends or siblings or even couples.   we're located in a centralized nice neighborhood with easy access to all attractions in the city.  Up to 3 guest a night with no extra fees.  Special price on long stays. Contact us for any details or questions :)
